name: ReCollection (ToKoMoTo, ChrisD_117, joey19, DJ Mix, remisnoah, MNCastaneda)
name_original: ReCollection (ToKoMoTo, ChrisD_117, joey19, DJ Mix, remisnoah, MNCastaneda)
description:
In ReCollection you are “Lost.” Your life has ended prematurely and you have awakened in Hollow Creek, a reflection of your hometown. After a horrible accident, you realize that many of your family members have not moved on. In Hollow Creek, you find that you have the ability to switch between the your physical body and "Soul Mode," a tether to the spiritual world. 

Search for places of interest that contain clues to releasing your family’s souls. Will helping your loved ones bring you peace?

HOW TO PLAY

  •  Movement - W, A, S, D
  • “Soul Mode” - “F”
  •  Interact - “E”  

A game developed by Cohort Alpha at Azusa Pacific University.
